import React, { useEffect } from 'react'; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom'; import Bredcrumb from 'src/components/core/Bredcrumb'; import SearchField from 'src/components/ecommerce/DefaultList/SearchField'; import UpButton from 'src/components/ecommerce/DefaultList/UpButton'; import Pagination from 'src/components/ecommerce/products/pagination'; import { getAllCoupon } from '../../../features/coupon/couponSlice'; const Coupons = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch(); useEffect(() => { dispatch(getAllCoupon()); }) const couponState = useSelector((state) => state.coupons.coupon); return (
{/* {dataState.map((data, index) => ( ))} */}
